data.name: Gekko Episode of Minato - Gallary Mode
data.detailed_description:
The gallery mode where you can check the contents of the main story will be released.

・ CG recollection
You can check the event CG viewed in the main story.

・ Scene recollection
You can check the event scenes and movies viewed in the main story.

・ Sound room
You can play the songs used in the main story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4160
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
